document_data.caption: A map showing Plague Street in northwest Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Plague Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Plague Street''' was a small road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Plague Street was found within northwest Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. It originated on [[Nool Street]] in the west and terminated in the east at the wall separating the Common Quarter from the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]. It intersected [[Cobble Road]] along the way.
document_data.Description: It was a small road measuring roughly {{SI|200|ft|long=yes}} in length.
